DataElement.preferredDefinition: The permissible values of yes/no/not applicable to indicate whether there is a diagnosis of Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the diagnosis of Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Human immunodeficiency virus. Species of LENTIVIRUS, subgenus primate lentiviruses (LENTIVIRUSES, PRIMATE), formerly designated T-cell lymphotropic virus type III/lymphadenopathy-associated virus (HTLV-III/LAV). It is acknowledged to be the agent responsible for the acute infectious manifestations, neurologic disorders, and immunologic abnormalities linked to the ACQUIRED IMMUNODEFICIENCY SYNDROME.

Concepts.definition: The virus isolated and recognized as the etiologic agent of AIDS. HIV-1 is classified as a lentivirus, a subtype of retroviruses.

Property.preferredDefinition: The process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 8/3/2015 Corrections made to VD in order to restore to original format: removed C49486 as rep term and replaced with C49797; restored long name and definition per Dianne Reeves/tt.

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF text
ReferenceDocuments.description: If yes, is the patient on a stable HAART regimen, have a CD4 count greater than 350 and have no detectable virus on quantitative PCR?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patients who are HIV positive
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patients who are HIV positive may participate IF they meet the following requirements, Must be stable on their anti-retroviral agents and Must have CD4 counts >400 and Must have undetectable viral loads and Must not be receiving prophylactic therapy for an opportunistic infection

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is HIV positive have they met the following requirements: Must be stable on their anti-retroviral regimen and be healthy from an HIV perspective.  Must have CD4 counts > 250 cells/mcL, and not be receiving prophylactic therapy for an opportunistic infection.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient is HIV positive, does the patient meet the criteria described in the protocol?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: For patient with known HIV-infected status, has patient been on effective anti-retroviral therapy with undetectable viral load within 6 months?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has a known HIV-infected status, has patient been on effective anti-retroviral therapy with undetectable viral load within 6 months?

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 2023.3.28 AQT added per ticket request CADSR0002164. ak
